infotexts.jobdescription.blueshield: Dedicated to safeguarding ship captains and crew with unwavering commitment and expertise. A trusted guardian of maritime security.
infotexts.entityname.blueshieldoutfit: A comfortable blue uniform used by high-ranked professional bodyguards
infotexts.entitydescription.bsstunbaton: A trusty tool for a trustworthy officer
infotexts.entitydescription.europanlaw: A book filled with cryptic symbols. Heavier than it looks
infotexts.entitydescription.crewtracker: Shows every crewmate's name, location, health and appoximate direction to them (regardless of distance or radio channel)
infotexts.entitydescription.bsimplanter: A modified syringe, capable of inserting some special implants
infotexts.entitydescription.implantdeathalarm: Whenever the person with this implant injected falls below 0 health or dies, every crewmate receives a notification (regardless of distance and radio channel) including current coordinates and hull name.
infotexts.entitydescription.implantchemical: Upon subject death, explodes violently in a cloud of acid, damaging everyone around. Everyone dies, so make it count.
infotexts.entitydescription.rescuehook: Fires a harmless hook, quickly grabbing the target and then quickly retracting, allowing the wielder to rescue crewmates from danger with relative ease. Reusable
infotexts.entitydescription.sleepgrenade: Slowly releases a cloud of sedative chemical in the air, slowing and then putting everyone around to sleep, humans and monsters alike. Breaks in water, somehow sedates those in diving suits
infotexts.entitydescription.boilinggrenade: When thrown in water, heats the surroudings so hard the water around boils and everyone nearby it is drawn towards the grenade. Can't be put off manually, but it disables itself when not in water. Even then, it's so hot it can't be picked up even in diving suits
infotexts.entitydescription.violentgrenade: When thrown and colliding with a wall or creature, explodes extremely violently and brighly, but doesn't damage the surroudings
infotexts.entitydescription.breathingtube: When implanted, prevents one from suffocating when below 0 health, if not in water
infotexts.entitydescription.unica: 7-round rapid fire revolver for those times when you need real POWER. Ammo cannot be crafted, you should check your local military shops or wrecks. Crafted empty
infotexts.entitydescription.unicaround: A special bullet for a special firearm. Can only be found in wrecks and such, or bought at outposts
infotexts.entitydescription.implantmindshield: When injected, makes its way to the brain and locks some of its neurons to prevent any external mind alterations. For some reason, it also strengthens your loyalty
infotexts.entitydescription.implantweldingshield: Special eye shields, preventing eyes from light damage
infotexts.entitydescription.commsterminal: Attach to a wall, then insert the auth key. Unlimited range, powered with internal battery. Useless without the Blueshield Officer
infotexts.entitydescription.greenauthkey: Green plastic card. When inserted in the comms terminal, boosts submarine movement speed, fabrication speed and deconstruction speed
infotexts.entitydescription.blueauthkey: Blue plastic card. When inserted in the comms terminal, boosts crew repair, welding and crew movement speed
infotexts.entitydescription.redauthkey: Red plastic card. When inserted in the comms terminal, boosts crew damage resistance and damage, allows use of gygax weaponry
infotexts.entitydescription.gygax: A powerful military mech, capable of withstanding extreme stress and moving with great speeds, but hard to make and only capable of firing during active red code
infotexts.talentdescription.glorytocoalition: Gain a one-time reward of [xpamount] experience and [bonus] [skillmedical], [skillhelm] and [skillweapons] for applying [requirement] medical items to your crewmates
infotexts.talentdescription.glorytocoalition2: Coalition faction shops offer [amount]% lower prices
infotexts.talentdescription.stateyourlawsextrared: Causes irreparable damage to your social status
infotexts.talentdescription.totalsurveillance: Track your crewmates down with the help of a crew tracker PDA
infotexts.talentdescription.dontdaredying: Whenever the person with death alarm implant injected falls below 0 health or dies, every crewmate receives a notification (regardless of distance and radio channel) including current coordinates and room name
infotexts.talentdescription.dontdaredying2: When a person with chemical implant injected dies, they explode in a cloud of strong acid
infotexts.talentdescription.medicaltools: CPR you apply is [amount]% more powerful
infotexts.talentdescription.learningtoswitchhandsr: Within [seconds] seconds after attacking with a pistol or revolver, your next attack with a stunning weapon is [damage]% more powerful
infotexts.talentdescription.learningtoswitchhandss: Within [seconds] seconds after attacking with a stunning weapon, your next attack with a pistol or a revolver is [damage]% more powerful
infotexts.talentdescription.breathingtube: Using a breathing tube implant allows you to breathe when below 0 health if you are not underwater
infotexts.talentdescription.bsselfcare: Medical items applied to you are [amount]% more powerful
infotexts.talentdescription.officerdrunkshield: You gain [amount]% resistance to damage when drunk
infotexts.talentdescription.adrenalinepump: Whenever you fall below 0 health, you will remain fully conscious for [time] seconds, but you are slowed by [slowdown]%
infotexts.talentdescription.sleepcarp: When you are below 0 health, gain [amount]% damage resistance
infotexts.talentdescription.laststand: Inflict [amount]% more damage with for every nearby enemy, if you are alone. Up to [maxamount]%
infotexts.talentdescription.unicared: Unica ammo cannot be fabricated - only found or bought at military outposts
infotexts.talentdescription.powbzzt: The multirevolver has 3 modes - short stun, progressive slowdown and lethal. Lethal mode is only available during active red code. Charged inside battery-charging devices, make sure you have one.
infotexts.talentdescription.mindblock: Mindshield implant makes a person permanently immune to psychosis and hallucinations
infotexts.talentdescription.whysodark: Muffler headset protects one from sensory overload, and welding implants protect you from blindness - two effects of the stun grenade and violent grenades
infotexts.talentdescription.trackerson: Every crewmate with a death alarm implant increases your speed by [speed]% and vitality by [vitality]%. Every crewmate without a death alarm implant gives you psychosis
infotexts.talentdescription.captainyouthere: You move [speed]% faster for every unconscious crewmember. Up to [speedmax]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.warcrimes: What horrors will it bring us?
infotexts.talentdescription.calltheshuttle: If no crewmember has died during mission, gain [moneybonus] marks and [xpbonus] experience
infotexts.talentdescription.codeextrared: Only one code can be active at a time!
infotexts.talentdescription.codegreen: Using the green auth key boosts pump and engine speed by [pumpenginespeed]%, fabrication speed and deconstruction speed by [fabricatorspeed]%
infotexts.talentdescription.codeblue: Using the blue auth key boosts crew repair, welding and movement speed by [amount]%
infotexts.talentdescription.codered: Using the red auth key boosts crew damage resistance and damage by [amount]%
infotexts.afflictiondescription.codegreen: Submarine movement speed and fabrication devices speed increased
infotexts.afflictiondescription.codered: You deal more damage and take less damage
infotexts.afflictiondescription.stunattack: You made an attack with a stunning weapon, now shoot it!
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pistolattack: You shot it with a pistol, now stun it!
infotexts.afflictiondescription.adrenalinepump: Your body still moves, even though it shouldn't
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sleepcarp: You hold for your life, surviving attacks that should've killed you
infotexts.afflictiondescription.captainyouthere: Your crewmate is in trouble, you must hurry
infotexts.afflictiondescription.lawenforcement: The Justice makes you take 20% extra damage
